attributes.additional_details: Because whilst it is acceptable for public servants to be reimbursed for expenses incurred whilst performing their duties, it is immoral for MPs to acquire a property portfolio and/or a source of income at the taxpayers' expense, especially when said property is not being used by the MP.
attributes.background: Introduce a Bill to effect the necessary legislation to force MPs who have rented out property in London purchased via expenses gained from the taxpayer to immediately repay all monies to the Treasury.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
